    • getParticlePairBondMap

      HashMap<String,ParticlePairHarmonicBond> getParticlePairBondMap()
      Hash map that maps particle-pair key to corresponding particle-pair bond. Note: Particle-pair key has to be created with Utils.getParticlePairKey().
      Returns:
      Hash map that maps particle-pair key to corresponding particle-pair bond

    • isGaussianRandomDpdForce

      boolean isGaussianRandomDpdForce()
      Flag for use of Gaussian random for random force
      Returns:
      True : Random DPD force is driven by random variable with Gaussian distribution with zero mean and unit variance (slower) False: Random DPD force is driven by random variable with uniform distribution with zero mean and unit variance (faster)

    • getElectrostatics

      Electrostatics getElectrostatics()
      Electrostatics parameters
      Returns:
      Electrostatics parameters or null if none are available

    • isInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationWithAllForces

      boolean isInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationWithAllForces()
      Type of initial potential energy minimization (true: All forces, false: DPD force only)
      Returns:
      Type of initial potential energy minimization

    • isInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput

      boolean isInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput()
      Flag for initial potential energy minimization step output
      Returns:
      True: Potential energy minimization step output is generated, false: Otherwise (NO output)

    • getPeriodicBoundaries

      PeriodicBoundaries getPeriodicBoundaries()
      Periodic boundaries
      Returns:
      Periodic boundaries

    • isDpdUnitMass

      boolean isDpdUnitMass()
      Flag for use of DPD unit masses: True : DPD masses of all particles are set to 1 False: The DPD mass of the most lightweight particle (often water) is set to 1. The masses of all other particles are set in relation to their molar mass ratios to the most lightweight particle.
      Returns:
      Flag value for use of DPD unit masses

    • getInitialVelocityScalingSteps

      int getInitialVelocityScalingSteps()
      Number of initial velocity scaling steps
      Returns:
      Number of initial velocity scaling steps

    • getRandomSeed

      int getRandomSeed()
      Seed for random number generation
      Returns:
      Seed for random number generation

    • getParticleNumber

      int getParticleNumber()
      Particle number
      Returns:
      Particle number

    • getMaximumNumberOfPositionCorrectionTrials

      int getMaximumNumberOfPositionCorrectionTrials()
      Maximum number of position correction trials
      Returns:
      Maximum number of position correction trials
